title: Quarkus 3.2.0.Final released - New security features, @QuarkusComponentTest
content: It is our pleasure to announce the release of Quarkus 3.2.0.Final. Even if we will maintain 2.16 for a few months still, we encourage all our users to start their migration journey to Quarkus 3. Major changes are: Various new security features The ability to test CDI components with @QuarkusComponentTest...
